definitions.definition: In a thin , loose , or scattered manner; scantily ; not thickly .
Barely; hardly; with little attempt to conceal.
examples: a thinly -veiled attack on my integrity
a thinly disguised attempt at sabotage

main_definition: In a thin , loose , or scattered manner; scantily ; not thickly .
secondary_definitions: Barely; hardly; with little attempt to conceal.
